title: After USS Abraham Lincoln, destroyer Delbert D. Black enters Red Sea amid tensions with Iran
summary_full: The US Navy has bolstered its Middle East presence with an additional warship, bringing the total to six destroyers, an aircraft carrier, and three littoral combat ships. This escalation follows President Trump's announcement of a "massive Armada" heading to Iran, signaling a strong push for a diplomatic deal on nuclear weapons and regional influence, though military action remains an option.
